item.title: Building User Interfaces with R's Shiny
item.description: Update 22nd September 2021 The dashboard/app referred to in this blog post can now be tested and used in a browser by visiting https://nelson-gon.shinyapps.io/shinymde. Introduction Admittedly, it has been a long time since my last blog entry. Between that time, I have been working on a number of projects that I maintain over at my GitHub and more importantly, I was working on my final year thesis and finalizing my undergraduate studies.
